entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
